name: hepmc
description:
The HepMC package is an object oriented, C++ event record for High
Energy Physics Monte Carlo generators and simulation.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependent_to.name: agile
dependent_to.description:
AGILe is A Generator Interface Library (& executable), i.e. a uniform
object oriented C++ interface for a variety of Fortran-based Monte Carlo
event generators..

dependent_to.name: dire
dependent_to.description:
DIRE (short for dipole resummation) a C++ program for all-order
radiative corrections to scattering processes in high-energy particle
collisions.

dependent_to.name: relax
dependent_to.description:
A set of Reflex libraries for the most common used general data types in
the LHC Computing Grid

dependent_to.name: vbfnlo
dependent_to.description:
VBFNLO is a fully flexible parton level Monte Carlo program for the
simulation of vector boson fusion, double and triple vector boson
production in hadronic collisions at next to leading order in the strong
coupling constant.

dependent_to.name: whizard
dependent_to.description:
WHIZARD is a program system designed for the efficient calculation of
multi-particle scattering cross sections and simulated event samples.

dependent_to.name: pythia8
dependent_to.description:
The Pythia program is a standard tool for the generation of events in
high-energy collisions, comprising a coherent set of physics models for
the evolution from a few-body hard process to a complex multiparticle
final state.

dependent_to.name: photos
dependent_to.description:
Photos is a Monte Carlo program for bremsstrahlung in the decay of
particles and resonances.

dependent_to.name: evtgen
dependent_to.description:
EvtGen is a Monte Carlo event generator that simulates the decays of
heavy flavour particles, primarily B and D mesons.

dependent_to.name: hepmcanalysis
dependent_to.description:
The HepMCAnalysis Tool is a tool for generator validation and
comparisons.

dependent_to.name: crmc
dependent_to.description:
CRMC (Cosmic Ray Monte Carlo package). CRMC is a package providing a
common interface to access the output from event generators used to
model the secondary particle production in hadronic collisons.

dependent_to.name: thepeg
dependent_to.description: Toolkit for High Energy Physics Event Generation

dependent_to.name: sherpa
dependent_to.description:
Sherpa is a Monte Carlo event generator for the Simulation of High-
Energy Reactions of PArticles in lepton-lepton, lepton-photon, photon-
photon, lepton-hadron and hadron-hadron collisions.

dependent_to.name: tauola
dependent_to.description: Tauola is a event generator for tau decays.

dependent_to.name: rivet
dependent_to.description: Rivet - the particle-physics MC analysis toolkit
